Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to be followed by SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all variants that include both SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where the prior activity is SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision compared to time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in major revision vs. minor revision pathways
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time until SW-Awaiting EIC Decision is performed after the last reviewer has agreed (i.e., final SW-Reviewer Agreed in a case)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision within the same case
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where multiple SW-Reviewer Agreed events occurred versus cases with only one
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision after the completion of all required reviewer agreements (last SW-Reviewer Agreed)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that contain at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to occur after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed in cases involving SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Cycle Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision measured from the moment the first reviewer was invited (SW-Initial Reviewer Selection) to its completion
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that lead to SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit versus those that lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'
